description: Julie 2.0 Phase 5b: Implemented TOON formatting for fast_search tool. Added Deserialize trait to OptimizedResponse, created encode_to_toon_with_fallback helper with error handling and JSON fallback, added output_format parameter to FastSearchTool ("json", "toon", "auto" modes). Smart auto mode uses TOON for 5+ results. Maintains backwards compatibility with JSON in structured_content. Code compiles successfully.
